title: 12/03/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/03/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps yesterday afternoon's action between the Ravens and Steelers.What allowed the Ravens to keep it a close game? We're joined by Former NFL QB Dan Orlovsky, ESPN reporter covering the NBA Tim MacMahon, and Basketball Hall of Famer Bill Walton. Plus, DP tells us who he thinks won the Russ Westbrook/John Wall trade.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
